subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The New England Patriots remained one of the N.F.L.’s four unbeaten teams last night by beating the Cincinnati Bengals, 34-13, with a performance that showed their versatility. Tom Brady had three more touchdown passes. Sammy Morris had one of the best games of his career. The defense had its way.
